itemListElement.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
itemListElement.description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and foldable design for easy storage.

itemListElement.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
itemListElement.description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches, programmable macro keys, and aluminum frame.

itemListElement.name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
itemListElement.description: High-capacity power bank with USB-C PD fast charging, dual USB ports, and LED battery indicator.

itemListElement.name: Smart Watch Pro
itemListElement.description: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant to 50m.

itemListElement.name: USB-C Hub 7-in-1
itemListElement.description: Compact hub with HDMI 4K, USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and 100W power delivery passthrough.
